name: Indian Okra and Onion stir fry. Mom's Pyaaz Waali Bhindi Subzi. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe
description: Indian Okra and Onion stir fry. Mom's Pyaaz Waali Bhindi Subzi. Indian Spiced Okra and Onions. Easy side to make you love Okra. Vegan gluten-free Recipe Serves 3
recipeIngredient: 1  green chili (finely chopped ( I use Serrano pepper))

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add oil and heat on medium.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add oil and heat on medium.

recipeInstructions.text: Add green chili and cook for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add green chili and cook for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add onion, mix and cook on low-medium heat until onion starts to turn translucent. 6-8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add onion, mix and cook on low-medium heat until onion starts to turn translucent. 6-8 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the Okra and turmeric, mix and cook, uncovered, on low-medium heat, for 25-30 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the Okra and turmeric, mix and cook, uncovered, on low-medium heat, for 25-30 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Once Okra is cooked to preference, add salt and mix well. Take off heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Once Okra is cooked to preference, add salt and mix well. Take off heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chili powder if you like and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chili powder if you like and mix well.
